comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: What would be the difference this time as compared to old cpu-minable coins, which are not available anymore in the trading market?Creating a new coin is easy, however, the sustenance of its market is hard.You need to look for a certain use case that you think can support a longer lifespan of your coin.Because right now, my impression says, this project won't survive long.

comments.author: sisyatek
comments.body: Unfortunately, projects are very difficult to progress if they are not managed well at the beginning.For the time being, we will launch with initial listings on 4 Exchanges.And our aim is definitely not to make money, but to support charities around the world with what we earn.Regardless of religion, language or race.And we believe that we can do our best for this.Even if we are a drop in the sea, our goal is a Beautiful World.Thanks for your Drop.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: Quote from: sisyatek on September 25, 2022, 04:37:11 AMUnfortunately, projects are very difficult to progress if they are not managed well at the beginning.For the time being, we will launch with initial listings on 4 Exchanges.And our aim is definitely not to make money, but to support charities around the world with what we earn.Regardless of religion, language or race.And we believe that we can do our best for this.Even if we are a drop in the sea, our goal is a Beautiful World.Thanks for your Drop.can you share what exchange list this coin? and how much total supply of the coins? because i don't see any info regarding that on the website, and i saw there is a countdown on the website can you explain that?

comments.author: sisyatek
comments.body: The names of the exchanges will be announced when the time comes.It will also go into Operation on our website the same day.

comments.author: sisyatek
comments.body: Hello to @everyone It seems that the name of our 1.st Exchange was learned by chance, a few days ago.https://discord.gg/nzAXDJVA - Exhange's Discord Network.https://www.bitoreum.exchange/ - Web SiteSo we don't feel the need to hide any more.We will be listed on Bitoreum.Exchange at 30.09.2022 - 12:00 UTC Time.The minimum submission for Exchange Amount is 100 BBC.Under this Amount will not been Deposited on your Account.The remaining 4 Exchanges will be notified 3 hours before their Release date.You will Determine the Value of the Coin.We wish everyone a happy day.Announcent on Discord.https://discord.com/channels/987986521091092500/1021486002843426927/1024346692876767314

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: sisyatek on September 25, 2022, 04:37:11 AMUnfortunately, projects are very difficult to progress if they are not managed well at the beginning.Yeah, and that would start with the decision as to how to allocate block rewards.  And oddly enough, all of these new ghostrider coins do something like this:Quote5%     Dev fee (3% Dev 1% Exchange 1 % To Foundations.)This coin is for charity?  Why give 3% of every block to the devs?  What foundation are you talking about?  Are you telling us Babacoin has its own foundation?  That would be laughable if it weren't so fucking stupid.Quote from: sisyatek on September 25, 2022, 04:37:11 AMFor the time being, we will launch with initial listings on 4 Exchanges.Just like all the other new cpu-mineable coins, and those exchanges will be risky, fly-by-night ones that specialize in listing shitcoins that no reputable exchange would.Quote from: sisyatek on September 25, 2022, 04:37:11 AMAnd our aim is definitely not to make money, but to support charities around the world with what we earn.Regardless of religion, language or race.BS.  Your goal is to make money, so you're not helping your case by being a bald-faced liar.  If what you said were true, the block reward system wouldn't be what it is.  Furthermore, what charities accept Babacoin?  Why not allocate part of the block reward to any of them, if there are any that accept this shitcoin.That statement about religion, language, and race sounds very much like the devs are deciding on what charities would be donated to--and that doesn't compute.  It doesn't make any sense at all.

comments.author: sisyatek
comments.body: As a person who has not yet come to the Discord channel and has not received information, I congratulate you for your comments.This is Wallet for Charity Funds - > https://explorer.babacoin.network/address/BRm2tDSc2H9JXPRgrYtspLAEnATW3TPuiqWho told you that charities accept Coins?Please have a sensible speech.Coins Accumulated here are based on timely pricing and in a way that does not harm the system.It will be bought by Buyers or exchanged on exchanges and the Currency obtained in return will be transferred to charities.Please do some research first and then judge here.Thanks for your comments.

comments.author: pinpins
comments.body: You can mine Babacoin at autoexchange mining pool Zergpool.com at 0.5% fee. Please use following commands for different mining options  Option 1 Auto coin switch mining by profitability within algorithm with autoexchange to specified coin wallet(BTC in example below) Code: -a gr -o stratum+tcp://ghostrider.mine.zergpool.com:5354 -u <YOURBTCWALLET> -p c=BTC Option 2 Direct coin mining with payout to coin wallet Code: -a gr -o stratum+tcp://ghostrider.mine.zergpool.com:5354 -u <YOURBBCWALLET> -p c=BBC,mc=BBCOption 3 Direct coin mining with autoexchange to specified coin wallet(BTC in example below) Code: -a gr -o stratum+tcp://ghostrider.mine.zergpool.com:5354 -u <YOURBTCWALLET> -p c=BTC,mc=BBCPlease note mc stands for mining coin symbol, c stand for payout coin symbol SOLO and PARTY mining Set m=solo, or m=party.YourPartyPassword to your password field to use this feature. No extra fees. Autoexchange to BTC, LTC, DASH, DOGE, ETH, BCH or any other currency we mine Happy mining,  cheers pinpin
